results.title: Mutant p53 murine oviductal epithelial cells induce progression of high-grade serous carcinoma and are most sensitive to simvastatin therapy in vitro and in vivo
results.text_hl: Through orthotopic implantation to replicate the fallopian tube origin of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@HGSC@@@, p53@VARIANT_p.R175H_TP53_human @VARIANT_tmVar:p|SUB|R|175|H;HGVS:p.R175H;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:7157;RS#:28934578;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:251 @@@R175H@@@ mutant cells upregulated the @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonate@@@ pathway to drive progression to advanced-stage @DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment abrogated this effect.

citations.NLM: Pereira M, Glogova A, Haagsma J, Stewart J, Shepherd TG, Petrik J. Mutant p53 murine oviductal epithelial cells induce progression of high-grade serous carcinoma and are most sensitive to simvastatin therapy in vitro and in vivo J Ovarian Res. 2023 Nov 20;16(1):218. PMID: 37986175
citations.BibTeX: @article{37986175, title={Mutant p53 murine oviductal epithelial cells induce progression of high-grade serous carcinoma and are most sensitive to simvastatin therapy in vitro and in vivo}, author={Pereira M and Glogova A and Haagsma J and Stewart J and Shepherd TG and Petrik J}, journal={J Ovarian Res}, volume={16}, number={1}, pages={218}}

results.title: Elicited soybean extract attenuates proinflammatory cytokines expression by modulating TLR3/TLR4 activation in high-fat, high-fructose diet mice
results.text_hl: The ESE dose 104 mg/kg BW, which was given in ND @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, did not alter @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_18033 @@@NFkappaB@@@+ expression (p < 0.05) when compared to ND groups (Fig. 3B). interestingly, @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@HFFD@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with either ESE or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did not significantly differ from declining @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_18033 @@@NFkappaB@@@+ expression.

citations.NLM: Atho'illah MF, Safitri YD, Nur'aini FD, Widyarti S, Tsuboi H, Rifa'i M. Elicited soybean extract attenuates proinflammatory cytokines expression by modulating TLR3/TLR4 activation in high-fat, high-fructose diet mice J Ayurveda Integr Med. 2021 Jan-Mar;12(1):43-51. PMID: 33531194
citations.BibTeX: @article{33531194, title={Elicited soybean extract attenuates proinflammatory cytokines expression by modulating TLR3/TLR4 activation in high-fat, high-fructose diet mice}, author={Atho'illah MF and Safitri YD and Nur'aini FD and Widyarti S and Tsuboi H and Rifa'i M}, journal={J Ayurveda Integr Med}, volume={12}, number={1}, pages={43-51}}
